name: Second Chance At World's End
description:
It's always everyone's wish for summer to never end.

When seventeen-year-old Callem wishes he could redo an embarrassing encounter with a long-time crush, he suddenly finds himself reliving that same day. With knowledge of how things turn out, he sets out to change the outcome of their encounter. And as the days go by and more regrets arise, he sets out to fix those too.

Maybe summer could finally be perfect.

But as he continues to relive moments and fix his regrets, he becomes entangled in a web of lies, conspiracies, and secrets. Would he alone be able to bear the burden of this ability that he had come to rely on all this time?

Will it all have been worth it?
Could he truly make everything right again?
And why does he, of all people, deserve a second chance?
